participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Emily loves to share her experiences and connect with others. She is caring and responsible, especially when it comes to her family.
participant_1.background: I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life. I collect stamps. I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants. I volunteer in my spare time. The kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and thoughtful, Jake enjoys exploring new interests and values his family time. He is laid-back yet cares about his appearance.
participant_2.background: I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family. I am a YouTuber. I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time. I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister. I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.

content.text: Hi there! I'm so excited to get to know you better!
Hi there! Same here, I love making new friends.
Have you ever been to a System of a Down concert?
I wish! I've been a fan of theirs for years but I've never had the chance to see them live.
I once got to see them live in concert and it was one of the best experiences of my life! They are so talented and put on an amazing show.
I'm so jealous! I'm sure it was an amazing experience.
It was! I've been a fan of theirs ever since.
I'm glad I met someone who is a fan of them too!
Me too! They're such an amazing band.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I collect stamps and volunteer in my spare time.
That's cool! I like to play with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
Aww, that's cute! I love parrots.
They're great pets!
They sound like they are.
They are!
I'm glad you have such a great pet.
Thanks, me too!
What's your favorite pizza topping?
I love pineapple on my pizza!
Interesting! I've never tried that before.
You should! It's really good!
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You won't regret it
